code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import"./style/App.scss";import Navigation from"./components/Navigation";import{Intro}from"./sections/Intro";import Timeline from"./sections/Timeline";import Footer from"./components/Footer";import{BgParticles}from"./components/BgParticles";import particles from"./constants/particlesConfig";function App(){useEffect(function(){var toAnimate=document.querySelectorAll('.animate');var observer=new IntersectionObserver(function(entries){entries.forEach(function(entry){if(entry.isIntersecting===true){entry.target.classList.add('animate--trigger');}else{entry.target.classList.remove('animate--trigger');}});});toAnimate.forEach(function(title){observer.observe(title);});});return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("main",{className:"app"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"app__container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Navigation,null),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Intro,null),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Timeline,null),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Footer,null)),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(BgParticles,{className:"particles",particles:particles}));}export default App;
